document.discussion_title: 2 appear in court for murder of student
document.topic_text: 2 appear in court for murder of student WHAS11 Staff , WHAS 11:53 AM. CDT April 25, 2016 Anthony Foster, 25, and Aron Ballard, 22, have been indicted in an April 2 shooting death of a woman on Bolling Avenue CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN GOOGLE+ PINTEREST LOUISVILLE, Ky. (WHAS11) – Two men charged in connection to the shooting death of a UofL student will be in court today. Anthony Foster is facing complicity to murder, attempted murder and six counts of wanton endangerment. Aron Ballard faces several counts of first degree assault and wanton endangerment. According to police, both men were involved in the murder of Lottie Eicher on April 2.
